<page title>: Dell E2014T 19 5" LED LCD Touchscreen Monitor 16 9 2 MS 461 5769 | eBay
general information: Marketing Information An engaging touch experience. A boldly reimagined touch-monitor experience, with natural and intuitive touch, great reliability and myriad connectivity options. Natural and intuitive touch: 5-point touch capability and sharp, fluid visuals with 1600 x 900 HD resolution, fast 2ms (gray-to-gray) response time and a high dynamic contrast ratio of 8 million:1. Multiple ports and cables: VGA, USB, DP and HDMI connectivity plus an MHL port allows direct display of smartphone/tablet content on the touch monitor while charging the mobile device at the same time. Peace of mind: Meets the latest environmental standards and is backed by three years Advanced Exchange Service for fast problem diagnoses and product replacement.
